text: Free datasets for projects can be found at https://www.mavenanalytics.io/data-playground. Remember also, Microsoft's AdventureWorks sample databases can be found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/samples/adventureworks-install-configure?view=sql-server-ver15&tabs=ssms.
